> l'identification des gros chèques

```{r, dataset}
library(cma)
library(data.table)

data <- mini_long_() |> nosolde_()  
```

```{r, exception}
data_exception <- data |> exception_()
data_exception |> 
  dplyr::select(-dplyr::matches("dc")) |>
  gt::gt()
```
